mapper.update: update sys_log set url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent = #{agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, url, parameter, remote_addr, agent, user_id, begin_time, end_time from sys_log ORDER BY begin_time DESC
